text: What is true about the Engineering Design Event?

answer_options.answer_text: Drawings in the EDR may also be renderings
A maximum of 5 points are awarded for the Design Spec Sheet (DSS)
Any EDR that exceeds 8 pages will not be reviewed at all
Judges may be selected on the basis of the quality of the EDR
